item.description:
Tokyo Restaurant,
388 Wickenden Street, Providence, RI 02903,
(401)331-5330.

We'll be using the traditional Japanese floor space at Tokyo Restaurant. Diners will be expected to remove their shoes and use chopsticks in the Japanese manner.

From points west, including Providence: I-95 to Exit 20, onto I-195 EASTBOUND to Exit 2, at end of ramp turn LEFT onto Wickenden St., continue to intersection with Hope St.

From points east, including East Providence: I-195 WESTBOUND to Exit 2, at end of ramp turn RIGHT onto Wickenden St., continue to intersection with Hope St.

For more information, see http://yellowpages.su...

group.name: The Rhode Island Sushi Meetup Group

item.name: The Providence Sushi March Meetup
